title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: ICT and Blended Learning Strategies for Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage (Experience with Smartphone Utilization)
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain blended learning design frameworks utilizing ICT tools in higher education settings
Learners can plan and execute real-time collaborative learning activities using smartphone-based tools
Learners can produce e-learning content prototypes applicable to actual university lectures through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
